ygData.subject: Re: third tinkering book
ygData.msgSnippet: Whats this?  Animated bait?  How does that work? And what do you mean about practice for non gnomes?  Tinkering is gnome only. ... gr0k - Stranger in a Strange
ygData.messageBody:
Whats this? Animated bait? How does that work?

And what do you mean about practice for non gnomes? Tinkering is gnome
only.

---
gr0k - Stranger in a Strange Land - http://www.juju.org
"Linux... find out what you've been missing while
you've been rebooting Windows NT" - Infoworld

----- Original Message -----
From: Russ Gresh <lordgrunk@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, September 07, 1999 5:25 PM
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] third tinkering book


while I agree that Josh is an ass I think he's right, we should stop wasting
time trying to guess the formula and work on finding the third book (which
is actually the first). even if someone does guess the fishing pole there
are still other things in the book that we don't know, like fireworks. I
know this book exists and to prove it I'll give you the one formula I was
able to get out of the person who has it. animated bait -- 1 cork, 1
spricket. the only purpose I can find for this is practice for non gnomes
since the two things cost much more than bait and it's trivial for a gnome.
personally I think the book is in Solusek's eye, the tinkering merchant has
to be there for some reason. I just hope we don't have to kill a gnome for
it.

Fixer gnomish enchanter
